mapper.select: SELECT image_machine, manufacturier_type_m, model_type_m, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, row_type_m, column_type_m, quantity_type_m, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM projet.machine JOIN projet.type_de_machine tdm on tdm.id_type_m = machine.id_type_m WHERE id_machine = 1;
SELECT image_machine FROM projet.machine WHERE id_machine = #{id_machine}

SELECT type_de_machine.manufacturier_type_m, type_de_machine.model_type_m, machine.id_machine FROM projet.machine JOIN projet.type_de_machine ON type_de_machine.id_type_m = machine.id_type_m WHERE projet.machine.id_machine = #{id_machine};
SELECT machine.id_machine FROM projet.machine JOIN projet.usager_x_machines ON usager_x_machines.id_machine = machine.id_machine WHERE projet.usager_x_machines.id_usager = #{name_usager};
